name: Grow Plant, Grow!
description:
Grow your plant as high as possible!

Water your plant to keep it healthy.

Click and drag the watering can to water the plant.

Click and drag the sun to move it . The plant will grow towards the sun but if it touches the sun, it will burn.

Click and drag the background to scroll up and down.

This game was made for the Mini Jam 128.

The theme was Health and the limitation was The only way to go is up.
